name: Orhan Gencebay
description: '''Orhan Gencebay''' (born 4 August 1944) is a [[Turkish people|Turkish]] musician, [[baÄŸlama]] [[virtuoso]], composer, singer, arranger, [[record producer|music producer]], music director, and actor. Gencebay was born in the coastal town of [[Samsun]] on 4 August 1944. He is of [[Crimean Tatars|Crimean Tatar]] descent. In 1998, he was named a [[State Artist (Turkey)|State Artist]] of Turkey.
